name: crabcatch
description:
survive in the  arena without toching the crab, earn money and trophies, buy attacks, skins or even boxes to make epic box openings.

also playable as 2 player game on pc

CONTROLLS

LOGIN TUTORIAL

- SOLO MODE: the normal mode, where you play alone with the crab(bot)

- DUO MODE: playing with one friend offline

- LOGIN/NEW ACCOUT

if you play the first time, answer

 ´´new acc´´

if you already played this game, and saved

your account, answer ´´code´´

and after that give your code!

if you sceleted ´´duo´´,  check
in first the  1. player, then the 2.!

LOBBY:

-right up at the screen you see your coins(p1 above,  p2 at the bottom)

-right down you see the button ,,offline´´(thats the play button)

- left you can see several buttons, also ,,locker´´

here you can choose your skin (only if you own one)

or your attacks
choose by clicking on it

HOW TO WIN:

the goal is to beat the crab

1st method: make way the crab util the time is up

2nd method: beat the crab by killing it (there are some attacks which reduce the lives of the crab

GAME CONTROLS:

P1: move: wasd

      attacks: c, v, b (in order you choosed them in the locker)

P2: move: arrow keys

      attacks: press the keys , . - (in order you choosed them in the locker)

made in scratch https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/540587686/
